snippet: The radio advertising market is not expected to grow much, so Pandora, the online radio service, is looking to grab ad dollars from terrestrial stations.
abstract: Advertising column highlights campaign by Internet radio service Pandora Media; observes the radio advertising market is not expected to grow much, so Pandora is looking to grab ad dollars from terrestrial stations.

byline.original: By BEN SISARIO and TANZINA VEGA

lead_paragraph: The radio advertising market is not expected to grow much, so Pandora, the online radio service, is looking to grab ad dollars from terrestrial stations.

headline.seo: Pandora Courts Local Advertisers by Reaching a Narrow Audience
headline.main: Pandora Courts Local Advertisers, by Offering Well-Defined Listeners
headline.print_headline: Pandora Courts Local Advertisers, by Offering Well-Defined Listeners
